projects.title: Here, Tomorrow
projects.description: This piece is more than just a celebration of new in-game content. It’s a cinematic journey into a richly imagined universe.

projects.title: Azuki Elementals
projects.description: Azuki Elementals is our hype-piece for Los Angeles based Web3 anime brand Azuki. This film showcases the Azuki Elementals, a collection of characters within the four domains of the Garden: Earth, Fire, Lightning and Water.

projects.title: Marvel Snap / Hero
projects.description: Inspired by the shiny new Marvel Snap game, we were tasked with creating a music video for ‘Hero’. A banging new track by Martin Garrix & JVKE.
